name: hterm-umdjs
description: Chromium's hterm, automatically packaged as a UMD module (CommonJS/AMD/globals)

scripts.update-and-publish: export VERSION="$(npm run build | tail -n1)" && git add . && git commit -m "Version $VERSION" && git tag "v$VERSION" && npm publish

author: Dan Kaplun <dbkaplun@gmail.com>
